title: Corel PaintShop Pro X8 18.1.0.167 Ultimate + Serial
description:
The software market does not fall short of image editors these days. Most of them are bundled with basic photo editing featurus which are not enough to make your work stand out of the crowd. If this is the case, you need a professional editing assistant, such as Corel Paint Shop Pro.


Manage photographs and view EXIF DATA

This is a full-featured graphic editor that includes some of the most amazing effects and correction tools the marked has ever seen. In addition, it also provides the means to quickly organize your images, by quickly selecting, sorting and rating them.


Corel PaintShop Pro features a stylish and well-organized interface that's divided into three main modules: Manage, Adjust and Edit. The first one  allows users to tag or ratye their photo's, as well as to edit the file information or view EXIF DATA.


Automatically adjust some image parameters

Starting with the Adjust Panel, the image editing part begins. In this workspace, users benefit from a few tools that aim to perform quick fixes of your photo's. As such, you have the Smart Photo Fix utility that has the ability to suggest just the right amount of brightness, shadows, highlights or saturation that your photo needs in order to look spectacular. You can also make adjustments to the color balance or remove the digital noise overlaid over your images.


A myriad of tools at you fingertips

Corel PaintShop Pro's strongest module is the one located in the Edit Workspace, this section is slightly different from the previous ones, this is the panel that comprises an array of menu's and tools, all for the greater good. Quicker access to editing options is provided via the Learning Center, a sidebar that provides shortcuts to the most important functions: Effect, Layers, Quick Adjustments, Text and Print to na a few.


Other feastures worth mentioning are: Selective Focus (to add depth of field while blurring other details), the RAW Lab (with improved histograms for better fine-tunning), the Smart Carver (enables you to remove objects from images without affecting it's quality) and the Makeover Tools (a set of tools for face enhanchments.


Evaluation

The system's performance might be burdened to some extent, especially if you are using an older computer. However, the response time is good and the interface you come by is professional and user-friendly. To sum up, Corel PaintShop Pro brings a set of sophisticated, yet not complicated tools for image editing, which make it one of the best choices in it's product category.


Faster, more flexible image-editing software, featuring new creative tools, more precise editing and easy quick fixes for your best photo's and designs. Bring ideas to life with the image editing and design versatility of PaintShop Pro X8. New creative tools, more precise selections, layer enhancements, faster brushes and new Batch Mode make this the fastest, most flexible PaintShop Pro ever.


- NEW! Fill shapes with text using Text Wrapping

- NEW! Easily move people or objects with Magic Move

- NEW! Easier Batch Mode

- NEW! Faster, more accurate selections

- NEW! Support for 4K displays


System requirements:

- Windows 10, Windows 8/8.1, Windows 7 with latest service pack 32-bit or 64-bit editions)

- Intel or AMD 1.5 GHz or faster processor with SSE2 supported (multi-core processor recommended)

- 2 GB RAM (4 GB or higher recommended)

- 1 GB hard disk space (2 GB recommended)

- 1024 x 768 resolution with 126-bit color display (1366 x 768 resolution with 24-bit or higher color display recommended)

- DirectX 9 or higher compatible audio card with latest driver

- Internet connection required for online features and tutorial video's
